lead_paragraph: Women's basketball coach Connie Yori abruptly resigned Tuesday after 14 seasons at Nebraska following an alleged investigation into how she treated her players.

headline.print_headline: Nebraska Coach Connie Yori Resigns After 14 Seasons
headline.main: Nebraska Coach Connie Yori Resigns After 14 Seasons
